mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.recruitment_id, a.created_at, a.status, a.applicant_id, a.introduce_rating_result_id, a.updated_at, a.updated_by FROM application a LEFT JOIN recruitment r ON a.recruitment_id = r.id LEFT JOIN applicant ap ON a.applicant_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN introduce_rating_result irr ON a.introduce_rating_result_id = irr.id LEFT JOIN member m ON a.updated_by = m.id
